frontPage.title: light in the box
frontPage.text: Contrary tot popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old. Richard McClinktock, a latin professor at Hampden-sydney College in Virgina,
frontPage.moreTxt: looked up one of the more obscure Latin words, consectetur, from a Lorem Ipsum passage, and going through the cites of the word in a classical literature, discovered the undiubtbke source. Lorem Ipsum comes from sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 of
